<a id="InputEventGesture"></a>

# InputEventGesture

**Inherits:** [InputEventWithModifiers](InputEventWithModifiers.md) **\<** [InputEventFromWindow](InputEventFromWindow.md) **\<** [InputEvent](InputEvent.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

**Inherited By:** [InputEventMagnifyGesture](InputEventMagnifyGesture.md), [InputEventPanGesture](InputEventPanGesture.md)

Abstract base class for touch gestures.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

InputEventGestures are sent when a user performs a supported gesture on a touch screen. Gestures can't be emulated using mouse, because they typically require multi-touch.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Tutorials

- [Using InputEvent](../tutorials/inputs/inputevent.md)

## Property Descriptions

<a id="InputEventGesture_property_position"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[Vector2](Vector2.md) **position** = `Vector2(0, 0)` [ðŸ”—](#InputEventGesture_property_position)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_position**\ (\ value\: [Vector2](Vector2.md)\ )
- [Vector2](Vector2.md) **get_position**\ (\ )

The local gesture position relative to the [Viewport](Viewport.md). If used in [Control._gui_input()](Control.md#Control_private_method__gui_input), the position is relative to the current [Control](Control.md) that received this gesture.
